title: in the moment (thank u, next unreleased)
lyrics:
[Verse]
I know we just met, but who cares?
I just wanna feel your lips, I’m so pressed
[Refrain]
I don’t wanna wait my whole life
Wanna wait my whole life, to do what’s on my mind
I don’t wanna waste a whole night
Tryna decide whether it’s wrong or right
[Pre-Chorus]
I don’t care
I spend my time how I like in my mind
I’m a billionaire (La-la-la, la-la-la, la-la-la)
Said, I don’t care ‘cause wanting you is as human nature
As breathin’ air, (Breathin’ air)
(La-la-la, la-la-la, la-la-la, ooh)
[Chorus]
Let’s do what we want, that shit’s beautiful
Just stay where we are, right here in the moment
Do what we want, that shit’s beautiful
Just stay where we are, right here in the moment
[Verse]
I know we just met, but who cares?
I just wanna feel your lips, I’m so pressed

[Refrain]
I don’t wanna wait my whole life
Wanna wait my whole life, to do what’s on my mind
I don’t wanna waste a whole night
Tryna decide whether it’s wrong or right
[Pre-Chorus]
I don’t care
I spend my time how I like in my mind
I’m a billionaire (La-la-la, la-la-la, la-la-la)
Said, I don’t care ‘cause wanting you is as human nature
As breathin’ air, (Breathin’ air)
(La-la-la, la-la-la, la-la-la, ooh)
[Chorus]
Let’s do what we want, that shit’s beautiful
Just stay where we are, right here in the moment
Do what we want, that shit’s beautiful
Just stay where we are
, 
right here in the moment
[Outro]
(In the moment)
